question:
The minimum number of members required to be present at a sitting of the House or the Committee for valid transaction of its business is called Quorum. In this context, consider the following: 
  1. The quorum to constitute a sitting of the House is 1/5th of the total number of members of the House. 
  2. The quorum to constitute a sitting in respect of a Committee it is 1/ 2nd of the total number of members of the Committee.
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
